member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion
member.summary: An accordion is a vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each contain a title, content snippet, or thumbnail representing a section of content. The headings function as controls that enable users to reveal or hide their associated sections of content. Accordions are commonly used to reduce the need to scroll when presenting multiple sections of content on a single page.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.ExpandMode
member.summary: Controls the expand mode of the Accordion, either allowing single or multiple item expansion.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.ChildContent
member.summary: The slot for the accordion items

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.OnChange
member.summary: Fires a event callback with `AdaptiveAccordionItem` as parameter when the active item changes

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem
member.summary: An individual item in an

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.HeadingLevel
member.summary: Configures the aria level of the heading element.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.Expanded
member.summary: Expands or collapses the item.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.Disabled
member.summary: Disables an accordion item

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.HeadingSlot
member.summary: Content which serves as the accordion item heading and text of the expand button

member.summary: Content which can be provided between the heading and the icon

member.summary: Content which can be provided between the start slot and icon

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.CollapsedIconSlot
member.summary: The collapsed icon Warning: currently there seems to be bug in awc implementation, as slot is not rendered correctly

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion
member.summary: An anchored region is a container component which enables authors to create layouts where the contents of the anchored region can be positioned relative to another "anchor" element. Additionally, the anchored region can react to the available space between the anchor and a parent "viewport" element such that the region is placed on the side of the anchor with the most available space, or even resize itself based on that space. For more information Microsoft FAST Docs

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.ChildContent
member.summary: The default slot for the content

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.Anchor
member.summary: The HTML ID of the anchor element this region is positioned relative to

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.Viewport
member.summary: The HTML ID of the viewport element this region is positioned relative to

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalPositioningMode
member.summary: Sets what logic the component uses to determine horizontal placement. Locktodefault forces the default position. Dynamic decides placement based on available space. Uncontrolled (default) does not control placement on the horizontal axis. See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalDefaultPosition
member.summary: The default horizontal position of the region relative to the anchor element Default is unset. See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalViewportLock
member.summary: Whether the region remains in the viewport (ie. detaches from the anchor) on the horizontal axis

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalInset
member.summary: Whether the region overlaps the anchor on the horizontal axis

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalThreshold
member.summary: How narrow the space allocated to the default position has to be before the widest area is selected for layout

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.HorizontalScaling
member.summary: Defines how the width of the region is calculated. See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalPositioningMode
member.summary: Sets what logic the component uses to determine vertical placement. Locktodefault forces the default position. Dynamic decides placement based on available space. Uncontrolled (default) does not control placement on the vertical axis. See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalDefaultPosition
member.summary: The default vertical position of the region relative to the anchor element Default is "Unset". See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalViewportLock
member.summary: Whether the region remains in the viewport (ie. detaches from the anchor) on the vertical axis.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalInset
member.summary: Whether the region overlaps the anchor on the vertical axis

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalThreshold
member.summary: How short the space allocated to the default position has to be before the tallest area is selected for layout.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.VerticalScaling
member.summary: Defines how the height of the region is calculated. Default is "Content". See

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.FixedPlacement
member.summary: Whether the region is positioned using css "position: fixed". Otherwise the region uses "position: absolute". Fixed placement allows the region to break out of parent containers.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAnchoredRegion.AutoUpdateMode
member.summary: Defines what triggers the anchored region to revaluate positioning. Default is "Anchor". In 'anchor' mode only anchor resizes and attribute changes will provoke an update. In 'auto' mode the component also updates because of - any scroll event on the document, window resizes and viewport resizes. See

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AutoUpdateMode
member.summary: Defines if the component updates its position automatically. Calling update() always provokes an update. anchor - the component only updates its position when the anchor resizes (default) auto - the component updates its position when: - update() is called - the anchor resizes - the window resizes - the viewport resizes - any scroll event in the document

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.VerticalPosition
member.summary: Values for the vertical positioning options for an anchored region

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AxisScalingMode
member.summary: Values to define the scaling behavior of an anchored region on a particular axis

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.HorizontalPosition
member.summary: Values for the horizontal positioning options for an anchored region

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AxisPositioningMode
member.summary: Values to define the base behavior of an anchored region on a particular axis

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAvatar
member.summary: An avatar is a graphical representation of a user or object. A common use case would be to display an image or text (usually initials) of a user or an object, such as in a user profile.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAvatar.ChildContent
member.summary: The default slot for avatar text, commonly a name or initials

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAvatar.MediaSlot
member.summary: Used for media such as an image

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAvatar.BadgeSlot
member.summary: Used to provide a badge, such as a status badge

member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveBadge
member.summary: Badge component is used to highlight an item and attract attention or flag status, such as “New”, “Sale”, or other short phrases or a number to represent unread messages, updates available, etc.. Typical use cases include, but are not limited to, denoting a sale or new item, flagging an item as part of a category or representing a value of unread messages.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveBadge.ChildContent
member.summary: The default slot for the badge

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier. The value will be used as the HTML global id attribute.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Class
member.summary: Optional CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Style
member.summary: Optional in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.AdditionalAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
